name: LH Favicon
author: Peter Shaw

sections.description: By default wordpress will use a resized version of your site icon as a favicon. This is not ideal as you may want a different icons, an svg favicon, or different transparency for your favicon. Thiss plugin solve this problem.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire lh-favicon folder to the plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to Appearance->Customise->Favicons and select and save a custom favicon and svg favicon
sections.faq:
Where can I see this is action?

You can view this plugin in actions on my sports webite princesparktouch.

What is something does not work?

LH Favicon, and all https://lhero.org plugins are made to WordPress standards. Therefore they should work with all well coded plugins and themes. However not all plugins and themes are well coded (and this includes many popular ones).

If something does not work properly, firstly deactivate ALL other plugins and switch to one of the themes that come with core, e.g. twentyfifteen, twentysixteen etc.

If the problem persists please leave a post in the support forum: https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/lh-favicon/. I look there regularly and resolve most queries.

What if I need a feature that is not in the plugin?

Please contact me for custom work and enhancements here: https://shawfactor.com/contact/
